name: Modern Flow Vintage Gi (Black)
description:
Only our second Gi we decided to put out for sale, but our best by far! This lightweight gi is great for those hot days in the academy or weigh ins at the largest competitions. Don't be confused though, this gi will not wilt under the pressure, nor is it easy to keep grips on!

-450 Pearl Weave
-10 oz Ripstop Pants
-Bungee Rope Drawstring
-Beautiful Port(color) embroideries and contrast stitching
-Thick EVA Foam Collar
-Tailored Fit
-Reinforced Knees 
-Pearl Weave Gusset

name: Koala Bear 2.0 Rashguard
description:
Our newest Rashguard showcasing Meerkatsu's second installment of the Angry Koala! 

This rashguard will have you taking the back of your greatest rival in no time!

-100% sublimated artwork
-Athletic close fitting cut
-Original artwork by Meerkatsu
-Limited edition 
-80% polyester 20% spandex

Pre-Order starts 11/07/13 and ends 11/17/13*


*end date subject to change
*production then shipment takes around 3-4 weeks

name: Super Chess Ranked Rashguard Long Sleeve (WHITE)
description:
Check out our new Super Chess Ranked Rashguards. With chess piece artwork done by Meerkatsu himself, you will have no problem looking awesome while competing or in the academy. Features include:

-IBJJF Approved
-100% sublimated artwork
-Athletic close fitting cut
-Designed to make you look better then you actually are
  *Note: will not turn you into Bobby Fischer or Rafa Mendes*
-Original artwork by Meerkatsu
-Limited edition 
-80% polyester 20%spandex


**IN STOCK AND READY TO SHIP**

name: MF X Kataaro Black Belt Collaboration
description: MADE IN THE USA BY KATAARO The Belt: A masterpiece collaboration commissioned by Modern Flow Brand with artwork designed by Meerkatsu. Each color belt has a unique chess piece design. This 1-3/4 inch wide jujitsu rank belt is available in standard BJJ colors. Construction is 100% twill cotton with a single strapping cotton core. The color rank belts have a black 4-1/2 inch rank sleeve on one end, which starts 1 inch from the belt end. The black belt rank sleeve is red and 7 inches long, with 3/4" white instructor stripes on each end. White 1/2 inch rank stripes can be added. Stripes are sewn on the sleeve with 1/8 inch spacing. For anyone wanting additional embroidery (name, academy, etc.), please order directly from Kataaro. There are lots of options to choose from. NOTE: Belts are made to order and once ordered are non-refundable unless defective. PRODUCTION TIME: 4-5 weeks not counting shipping.

name: Modern Flow's "Ranger" Gi
description:
Designed by avid Jiu Jitsu competitors with an unhealthy Gi addiction. The Ranger was developed from the ground up to be the perfect training and competition gi. From the style to the fit, you will love this gi the second you put it on. 

-525 gram Pearl Weave
-10 oz Durable Drill Cotton Pants
-Thick EVA Foam Collar
-Tailored Fit
-Reinforced Knees and Underarms
-Pearl Weave Gusset
-Brown Contrast Stitching
-Brown and Green Embroidered Logos

*In Stock And Ready To Ship!!*

name: Guard your back...PACK
description:
The "Guard your back... PACK" Features:

-3100 cubic inches
-Made of 1050 denier Kodra for super strength
-2 main compartments for storage (one for gi, one for laptop)
-1 outside bag strap down pocket for gi and wet items
-1 medium size side pocket (removable MOLLE attachment)
-5 smaller compartments throughout bag for other misc items
-17" laptop padded compartment
-1 water bottle holder
-Reinforced stitching along entire bag
-Thick padding lining the shoulder straps, backing and waist strap
-Sternum strap included
-Heavy duty plastic buckles
-YKK zippers (best in the business)
-Rubber/plastic wrapped lift handle
-MOLLE webbing and attachment compatible for customization

What fits inside comfortably:
-2 gis
-1 laptop
-camera, keys, wallet, phone, iPod etc...
-No gi items such as shorts rash guards underwear 
-Towel/shower bag
-sandals
-change of clothes

This bag is big enough to fit all your gear in for a tournament but small enough to fit as a carry on during flights!
